articles.title: London Stock Exchange becomes Europe's largest stock market again - BBC.com
articles.description: A French election is driving down the value of French listed companies, analysts say
articles.content:
By Mitchell Labiak, Business reporter
The UKs main stock market retook its crown as Europes most valuable for the first time in nearly two years, data shows.

articles.title: Russia's ghost loomed over Ukraine peace summit - POLITICO Europe
articles.description: More than 80 out of 101 participants supported the final statement backing Ukraine’s territorial integrity, but some key countries balked.
